BatchAddDeviceGroupRelations.title: BatchAddDeviceGroupRelations
BatchAddDeviceGroupRelations.summary: Adds one or more devices to a group.

BatchAddThingTopo.title: BatchAddThingTopo
BatchAddThingTopo.summary: Establishes multiple topological relationships at a time.

BatchBindDeviceToEdgeInstanceWithDriver.title: BatchBindDeviceToEdgeInstanceWithDriver
BatchBindDeviceToEdgeInstanceWithDriver.summary: Binds multiple devices to an edge instance and configures a driver for the devices.

BatchCheckDeviceNames.title: BatchCheckDeviceNames
BatchCheckDeviceNames.summary: Creates multiple custom DeviceNames under a specified product. IoT Platform checks the validity of these DeviceNames.

BatchCheckImportDevice.title: BatchCheckImportDevice
BatchCheckImportDevice.summary: Verifies multiple devices that are added at the same time.

BatchCheckVehicleDevice.title: BatchCheckVehicleDevice
BatchCheckVehicleDevice.summary: Verifies multiple devices that are added to a gateway product at a time.

BatchClearEdgeInstanceDeviceConfig.title: BatchClearEdgeInstanceDeviceConfig
BatchClearEdgeInstanceDeviceConfig.summary: Deletes the configurations of one or more devices that are bound to an edge instance.

BatchDeleteDeviceGroupRelations.title: BatchDeleteDeviceGroupRelations
BatchDeleteDeviceGroupRelations.summary: Removes multiple devices from a specified group. You can call this operation to delete only the relationships between the devices and the group. These devices are not deleted.

BatchGetDeviceState.title: BatchGetDeviceState
BatchGetDeviceState.summary: Queries the status of multiple devices at a time.

BatchGetEdgeDriver.title: BatchGetEdgeDriver
BatchGetEdgeDriver.summary: Queries information about multiple drivers at a time.

BatchGetEdgeInstanceDeviceConfig.title: BatchGetEdgeInstanceDeviceConfig
BatchGetEdgeInstanceDeviceConfig.summary: Queries the configuration information of one or more devices that are bound to an edge instance.

BatchGetEdgeInstanceDriverConfigs.title: BatchGetEdgeInstanceDriverConfigs
BatchGetEdgeInstanceDriverConfigs.summary: Queries the configuration information of one or more drivers that are bound to an edge instance.

BatchImportDevice.title: BatchImportDevice
BatchImportDevice.summary: Adds multiple devices to a Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) gateway product at the same time.

BatchImportVehicleDevice.title: BatchImportVehicleDevice
BatchImportVehicleDevice.summary: Adds multiple devices to a gateway product at a time.

BatchPub.title: BatchPub
BatchPub.summary: Publishes a message to multiple devices of a product by using a custom topic.

BatchQueryDeviceDetail.title: BatchQueryDeviceDetail
BatchQueryDeviceDetail.summary: Queries the details of multiple devices under a product.

BatchRegisterDevice.title: BatchRegisterDevice
BatchRegisterDevice.summary: Registers multiple devices under a product. The DeviceNames of these devices are randomly generated.

BatchRegisterDeviceWithApplyId.title: BatchRegisterDeviceWithApplyId
BatchRegisterDeviceWithApplyId.summary: Registers multiple devices by using an application ID at a time.

BatchUnbindDeviceFromEdgeInstance.title: BatchUnbindDeviceFromEdgeInstance
BatchUnbindDeviceFromEdgeInstance.summary: Unbinds multiple devices from an edge instance.

BatchUpdateDeviceNickname.title: BatchUpdateDeviceNickname
BatchUpdateDeviceNickname.summary: Modifies the aliases of multiple devices.

BindDriverToEdgeInstance.title: BindDriverToEdgeInstance
BindDriverToEdgeInstance.summary: Binds a driver to an edge instance.

BindGatewayToEdgeInstance.title: BindGatewayToEdgeInstance
BindGatewayToEdgeInstance.summary: Binds a gateway to an edge instance.

BindLicenseDevice.title: BindLicenseDevice
BindLicenseDevice.summary: Binds a license to devices of a specific product.

CancelOTATaskByDevice.title: CancelOTATaskByDevice
CancelOTATaskByDevice.summary: Cancels the device update tasks that are in the to be pushed, pushed, or in upgrade state of an OTA update package.

CancelOTATaskByJob.title: CancelOTATaskByJob
CancelOTATaskByJob.summary: Cancels update tasks of a specified batch.

CheckBindLicenseDeviceProgress.title: CheckBindLicenseDeviceProgress
CheckBindLicenseDeviceProgress.summary: Queries the authorization progress of devices based on a unique ID returned by the BindLicenseDevice operation. The unique ID is specified by the CheckProgressId parameter.

ClearDeviceDesiredProperty.title: ClearDeviceDesiredProperty
ClearDeviceDesiredProperty.summary: Deletes the desired values of properties of a device.

ClearEdgeInstanceDriverConfigs.title: ClearEdgeInstanceDriverConfigs
ClearEdgeInstanceDriverConfigs.summary: Deletes the configurations of a driver that is bound to an edge instance.

CloseEdgeInstanceDeployment.title: CloseEdgeInstanceDeployment
CloseEdgeInstanceDeployment.summary: Stops the deployment tasks of an edge instance.

ConfirmOTATask.title: ConfirmOTATask
ConfirmOTATask.summary: Confirms the device update tasks that are in the pending confirmation status.

CopyThingModel.title: CopyThingModel
CopyThingModel.summary: Copies a Thing Specification Language (TSL) model from a source product to a destination product.

CountSpeechBroadcastHour.title: CountSpeechBroadcastHour
CountSpeechBroadcastHour.summary: Queries the number of speeches that were broadcasted in a specific hour.

CreateConsumerGroup.title: CreateConsumerGroup
CreateConsumerGroup.summary: Creates a consumer group that is required for an AMQP server-side subscription.

CreateConsumerGroupSubscribeRelation.title: CreateConsumerGroupSubscribeRelation
CreateConsumerGroupSubscribeRelation.summary: Adds a consumer group to an AMQP subscription.

CreateDestination.title: CreateDestination
CreateDestination.summary: Creates a data destination for a parser.

CreateDeviceDistributeJob.title: CreateDeviceDistributeJob
CreateDeviceDistributeJob.summary: Creates a task to distribute devices. The product to which the devices belong is distributed by default.

CreateEdgeInstanceDeployment.title: CreateEdgeInstanceDeployment
CreateEdgeInstanceDeployment.summary: Creates a deployment task for an edge instance.

CreateEdgeOssPreSignedAddress.title: CreateEdgeOssPreSignedAddress
CreateEdgeOssPreSignedAddress.summary: Creates a pre-signed URL for an object that is stored in Object Storage Service (OSS).

CreateLoRaNodesTask.title: CreateLoRaNodesTask
CreateLoRaNodesTask.summary: Creates multiple Long Range Wide Area Networking (LoRaWAN) devices.

CreateOTAFirmware.title: CreateOTAFirmware
CreateOTAFirmware.summary: Creates an over-the-air (OTA) update package for devices after you generate a URL for each file that you want to add to the OTA update package.

CreateOTAModule.title: CreateOTAModule
CreateOTAModule.summary: Creates an over-the-air (OTA) module for a product.

CreateOTAVerifyJob.title: CreateOTAVerifyJob
CreateOTAVerifyJob.summary: Creates a task to verify an over-the-air (OTA) update package.

CreateProductTopic.title: CreateProductTopic
CreateProductTopic.summary: Creates a custom topic category for a specified product.

CreateRule.title: CreateRule
CreateRule.summary: Creates a data forwarding rule for a specified topic.

CreateRuleAction.title: CreateRuleAction
CreateRuleAction.summary: Creates a rule action for a specified rule to forward processed data from a topic to another topic or a supported Alibaba Cloud service.

CreateSubscribeRelation.title: CreateSubscribeRelation
CreateSubscribeRelation.summary: Creates a Message Service (MNS) or Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) server-side subscription.

CreateThingModel.title: CreateThingModel
CreateThingModel.summary: Adds a Thing Specification Language (TSL) feature to a specified product. You can specify the extended information about the feature.

CreateThingScript.title: CreateThingScript
CreateThingScript.summary: Submits a data parsing script for a specified product.

CreateTopicRouteTable.title: CreateTopicRouteTable
CreateTopicRouteTable.summary: Establishes message routing relationships between topics.

DeleteClientIds.title: DeleteClientIds
DeleteClientIds.summary: Deletes all ClientIDs of a device if the number of ClientIDs exceeds the limit 5. This API operation applies to preregistration-free unique-certificate-per-product authentication.

DeleteConsumerGroup.title: DeleteConsumerGroup
DeleteConsumerGroup.summary: Deletes a consumer group when you configure an AMQP server-side subscription.

DeleteConsumerGroupSubscribeRelation.title: DeleteConsumerGroupSubscribeRelation
DeleteConsumerGroupSubscribeRelation.summary: Removes a consumer group from an AMQP subscription.

DeleteDevice.title: DeleteDevice
DeleteDevice.summary: Deletes a device. You can also call this operation to delete the topological relationships between a gateway and the sub-devices that are connected to the gateway.

DeleteDeviceFile.title: DeleteDeviceFile
DeleteDeviceFile.summary: Deletes a file that is uploaded to IoT Platform from a device.

DeleteDeviceProp.title: DeleteDeviceProp
DeleteDeviceProp.summary: Deletes a tag from a device.

DeleteProductTags.title: DeleteProductTags
DeleteProductTags.summary: Deletes the tags of a product.

DeleteSubscribeRelation.title: DeleteSubscribeRelation
DeleteSubscribeRelation.summary: Deletes a Message Service (MNS) or AMQP server-side subscription.

DeleteThingModel.title: DeleteThingModel
DeleteThingModel.summary: Removes one or more Thing Specification Language (TSL) features from a specified product. The features can be properties, services, or events.

DeleteTopicRouteTable.title: DeleteTopicRouteTable
DeleteTopicRouteTable.summary: Deletes the routing relationships of a specified custom topic.

DetachDestination.title: DetachDestination
DetachDestination.summary: Disassociates a parser from a data destination.

EnableThing.summary: Enables a device that has been disabled.

GenerateDeviceNameListURL.title: GenerateDeviceNameListURL
GenerateDeviceNameListURL.summary: Generates the URL and details of a device list file that you want to upload to Object Storage Service (OSS). When you create a static update batch, you can specify devices that you want to update in a device list file.

GenerateOTAUploadURL.title: GenerateOTAUploadURL
GenerateOTAUploadURL.summary: Generates the URL and other information that are required to upload an update package file to Object Storage Service (OSS).

GetDeviceShadow.title: GetDeviceShadow
GetDeviceShadow.summary: Queries the shadow information of a specific device.

GetDeviceStatus.title: GetDeviceStatus
GetDeviceStatus.summary: Queries the status of a device.

GetEdgeDriverVersion.title: GetEdgeDriverVersion
GetEdgeDriverVersion.summary: Queries information about a driver version.

GetEdgeInstance.title: GetEdgeInstance
GetEdgeInstance.summary: Queries detailed information about an edge instance.

GetEdgeInstanceDeployment.title: GetEdgeInstanceDeployment
GetEdgeInstanceDeployment.summary: Queries detailed information about a deployment task of an edge instance.

GetGatewayBySubDevice.title: GetGatewayBySubDevice
GetGatewayBySubDevice.summary: Queries the information of a gateway based on sub-device information.

GetLoraNodesTask.title: GetLoraNodesTask
GetLoraNodesTask.summary: Queries the status of the task for creating multiple Long Range Wide Area Networking (LoRaWAN) devices at the same time.

GetRule.title: GetRule
GetRule.summary: Queries detailed information about a specified rule.

GetRuleAction.title: GetRuleAction
GetRuleAction.summary: Queries detailed information of a specified rule action.

GetSpeechLicenseDeviceStatistics.title: GetSpeechLicenseDeviceStatistics
GetSpeechLicenseDeviceStatistics.summary: Queries the information about Speech Sending Service licenses that are bound to devices.

GetThingModelTsl.title: GetThingModelTsl
GetThingModelTsl.summary: Queries the Thing Specification Language (TSL) model of a product.

GetThingModelTslPublished.title: GetThingModelTslPublished
GetThingModelTslPublished.summary: Queries the published TSL model of a product.

GetThingScript.title: GetThingScript
GetThingScript.summary: Queries a data parsing script for a specified product.

GetThingTemplate.title: GetThingTemplate
GetThingTemplate.summary: Queries the Thing Specification Language (TSL) information of a specified category.

GetThingTopo.title: GetThingTopo
GetThingTopo.summary: Queries the sub-devices of a specified gateway device.

ImportDevice.title: ImportDevice
ImportDevice.summary: Adds a device to a Message Queuing Telemetry Transport (MQTT) gateway product.

ImportThingModelTsl.title: ImportThingModelTsl
ImportThingModelTsl.summary: Imports a Thing Specification Language (TSL) model to a specified product.

InvokeThingService.title: InvokeThingService
InvokeThingService.summary: Calls a service of a device.

InvokeThingsService.title: InvokeThingsService
InvokeThingsService.summary: Calls multiple device services at a time.

ListOTAJobByDevice.title: ListOTAJobByDevice
ListOTAJobByDevice.summary: Queries all the update batches of a device by update package.

ListOTAJobByFirmware.title: ListOTAJobByFirmware
ListOTAJobByFirmware.summary: Queries the update batches of an update package.

ListOTAModuleByProduct.title: ListOTAModuleByProduct
ListOTAModuleByProduct.summary: Queries all OTA modules of a product.

ListOTAModuleVersionsByDevice.title: ListOTAModuleVersionsByDevice
ListOTAModuleVersionsByDevice.summary: Queries the version information of the over-the-air (OTA) modules that are submitted by a device.

ListOTATaskByJob.title: ListOTATaskByJob
ListOTATaskByJob.summary: Queries the update tasks of a device by update batch.

ListOTAUnfinishedTaskByDevice.title: ListOTAUnfinishedTaskByDevice
ListOTAUnfinishedTaskByDevice.summary: Queries uncompleted update tasks of a specified device.

ListParserDataSource.title: ListParserDataSource
ListParserDataSource.summary: Queries the data sources of a parser.

ListProductTags.title: ListProductTags
ListProductTags.summary: Queries all the tags of a product.

ListRuleActions.title: ListRuleActions
ListRuleActions.summary: Queries all the configured data forwarding actions of a specific rule. When the rule is triggered, data can be forwarded to different destinations based on the configured actions.

ListThingModelVersion.title: ListThingModelVersion
ListThingModelVersion.summary: Queries the Thing Specification Language (TSL) model versions of a specified product.

ListThingTemplates.title: ListThingTemplates
ListThingTemplates.summary: Queries standard product categories that are predefined by IoT Platform.

NotifyAddThingTopo.title: NotifyAddThingTopo
NotifyAddThingTopo.summary: Notifies a gateway to add topological relationships.

PageQuerySharedSpeechOpen.title: PageQuerySharedSpeechOpen
PageQuerySharedSpeechOpen.summary: Queries the speeches that you share.

PageQuerySpeechBroadcastHour.title: PageQuerySpeechBroadcastHour
PageQuerySpeechBroadcastHour.summary: Queries the shared speech broadcasting data of a specific hour by page in Speech Sending Service.

PrintByTemplate.title: PrintByTemplate
PrintByTemplate.summary: Prints a receipt that follows the template in the Letter Sending Service console.

Pub.title: Pub
Pub.summary: Publishes a message to a specified device by using a custom topic.

PubBroadcast.title: PubBroadcast
PubBroadcast.summary: Broadcasts messages to online devices of a product. You can specify all online devices or only the online devices that subscribe to a specified topic.

PublishThingModel.title: PublishThingModel
PublishThingModel.summary: Publishes the Thing specification Language (TSL) model of a specified product.

QueryBatchRegisterDeviceStatus.title: QueryBatchRegisterDeviceStatus
QueryBatchRegisterDeviceStatus.summary: Queries the processing status and result of device registration for multiple devices.

QueryCertUrlByApplyId.title: QueryCertUrlByApplyId
QueryCertUrlByApplyId.summary: Queries the URL from which you can download the X.509 certificates of created devices.

QueryClientIds.title: QueryClientIds
QueryClientIds.summary: Queries the ClientIDs of a device. This API operation applies to preregistration-free unique-certificate-per-product authentication.

QueryConsumerGroupByGroupId.title: QueryConsumerGroupByGroupId
QueryConsumerGroupByGroupId.summary: Queries the detailed information about a consumer group based on the consumer group ID when you use an AMQP server-side subscription.

QueryConsumerGroupList.title: QueryConsumerGroupList
QueryConsumerGroupList.summary: Queries all consumer groups of the current account when you use AMQP server-side subscriptions. You can also call this operation to perform a fuzzy search by consumer group name.

QueryConsumerGroupStatus.title: QueryConsumerGroupStatus
QueryConsumerGroupStatus.summary: Queries the status of a consumer group when you use an AMQP server-side subscription. The status information includes online client information, message consumption rate, number of accumulated messages, and last message consumption time.

QueryDevice.title: QueryDevice
QueryDevice.summary: Queries the devices of a product.

QueryDeviceBySQL.title: QueryDeviceBySQL
QueryDeviceBySQL.summary: Queries devices by executing an SQL-like statement. This operation returns the devices that meet the conditions that you specified in the SQL-like statement.

QueryDeviceDesiredProperty.title: QueryDeviceDesiredProperty
QueryDeviceDesiredProperty.summary: Queries the desired values of properties of a device.

QueryDeviceDetail.title: QueryDeviceDetail
QueryDeviceDetail.summary: Queries the details of a device.

QueryDeviceEventData.title: QueryDeviceEventData
QueryDeviceEventData.summary: Queries the event records of a specified device.

QueryDeviceFile.summary: Queries the information about a file that is uploaded to IoT Platform from a device.

QueryDeviceFileList.title: QueryDeviceFileList
QueryDeviceFileList.summary: Queries information about all files that are uploaded to IoT Platform from a device.

QueryDeviceGroupByDevice.title: QueryDeviceGroupByDevice
QueryDeviceGroupByDevice.summary: Queries groups to which a device belongs.

QueryDeviceGroupInfo.title: QueryDeviceGroupInfo
QueryDeviceGroupInfo.summary: Queries the details of a group.

QueryDeviceGroupTagList.title: QueryDeviceGroupTagList
QueryDeviceGroupTagList.summary: Queries the tags of a group.

QueryDeviceInfo.title: QueryDeviceInfo
QueryDeviceInfo.summary: Queries the basic information about a specified device. The information includes the device ID, device certificate, and alias.

QueryDeviceListByDeviceGroup.title: QueryDeviceListByDeviceGroup
QueryDeviceListByDeviceGroup.summary: Queries the devices of a group.

QueryDeviceOriginalEventData.title: QueryDeviceOriginalEventData
QueryDeviceOriginalEventData.summary: Queries the event records that are submitted by a specified device. These records include events that are verified and not verified by a specified Thing Specification Language (TSL) model.

QueryDeviceOriginalPropertyData.title: QueryDeviceOriginalPropertyData
QueryDeviceOriginalPropertyData.summary: Queries the original property records that are submitted by a specified device. These records include the records of properties that passed and failed the verification of a specified Thing Specification Language (TSL) model.

QueryDeviceOriginalPropertyStatus.title: QueryDeviceOriginalPropertyStatus
QueryDeviceOriginalPropertyStatus.summary: Queries the original property snapshots that are submitted by a specified device. These snapshots include properties that are verified and not verified by a specified Thing Specification Language (TSL) model.

QueryDeviceOriginalServiceData.title: QueryDeviceOriginalServiceData
QueryDeviceOriginalServiceData.summary: Queries the original service records that are submitted by a specified device. These records include services that are verified and not verified by a specified Thing Specification Language (TSL) model.

QueryDeviceProp.title: QueryDeviceProp
QueryDeviceProp.summary: Queries the tags of a device.

QueryDevicePropertiesData.title: QueryDevicePropertiesData
QueryDevicePropertiesData.summary: Queries multiple properties that are submitted by a device within a specified period.

QueryDevicePropertyData.title: QueryDevicePropertyData
QueryDevicePropertyData.summary: Queries the data of a property in a device or a digital twin node within a specified period of time.

QueryDevicePropertyStatus.title: QueryDevicePropertyStatus
QueryDevicePropertyStatus.summary: Queries all the property snapshots of a device or digital twin node.

QueryDeviceServiceData.title: QueryDeviceServiceData
QueryDeviceServiceData.summary: Queries the service call records of a specified device.

QueryDeviceStatistics.title: QueryDeviceStatistics
QueryDeviceStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of devices, including the number of online devices, the number of activated devices, and the total number of created devices.

QueryDeviceSubTopic.title: QueryDeviceSubTopic
QueryDeviceSubTopic.summary: Queries the topics to which a device has subscribed.

QueryDynamicGroupDevices.title: QueryDynamicGroupDevices
QueryDynamicGroupDevices.summary: Queries the devices in a dynamic group

QueryEdgeDriver.title: QueryEdgeDriver
QueryEdgeDriver.summary: Queries information about drivers by page.

QueryEdgeDriverVersion.title: QueryEdgeDriverVersion
QueryEdgeDriverVersion.summary: Queries the versions of a driver by page.

QueryEdgeInstance.title: QueryEdgeInstance
QueryEdgeInstance.summary: Queries all edge instances that belong to a specified Alibaba Cloud account.

QueryEdgeInstanceDevice.title: QueryEdgeInstanceDevice
QueryEdgeInstanceDevice.summary: Queries the devices that are bound to an edge instance.

QueryEdgeInstanceDriver.title: QueryEdgeInstanceDriver
QueryEdgeInstanceDriver.summary: Queries the drivers that are bound to an edge instance.

QueryEdgeInstanceGateway.title: QueryEdgeInstanceGateway
QueryEdgeInstanceGateway.summary: Queries the gateways that are bound to an edge instance.

QueryEdgeInstanceHistoricDeployment.title: QueryEdgeInstanceHistoricDeployment
QueryEdgeInstanceHistoricDeployment.summary: Queries the deployment task records of an edge instance.

QueryImportedDeviceByApplyId.title: QueryImportedDeviceByApplyId
QueryImportedDeviceByApplyId.summary: Queries multiple devices that are added at the same time by application ID.

QueryLicenseDeviceList.title: QueryLicenseDeviceList
QueryLicenseDeviceList.summary: Queries the devices that are bound to a license.

QueryMessageInfo.title: QueryMessageInfo
QueryMessageInfo.summary: Queries the details of an upstream or downstream device message. The details include the content, time when the message was created, and name of the topic from which the message is sent.

QueryOTAFirmware.title: QueryOTAFirmware
QueryOTAFirmware.summary: Queries the details of a specified OTA update package, including the name, type, and status of the update package.

QueryOTAJob.title: QueryOTAJob
QueryOTAJob.summary: Queries the details of an update batch.

QueryPageByApplyId.title: QueryPageByApplyId
QueryPageByApplyId.summary: Queries the information of multiple devices that you have registered.

QueryProduct.title: QueryProduct
QueryProduct.summary: Queries the details of a product.

QueryProductCertInfo.title: QueryProductCertInfo
QueryProductCertInfo.summary: Queries the X.509 certificate information of a product.

QueryProductTopic.title: QueryProductTopic
QueryProductTopic.summary: Queries the topic categories of a specified product.

QueryProjectShareDeviceList.title: QueryProjectShareDeviceList
QueryProjectShareDeviceList.summary: Queries the devices to which a project is shared.

QueryShareTaskDeviceList.title: QueryShareTaskDeviceList
QueryShareTaskDeviceList.summary: Queries the devices in a sharing task.

QuerySpeechLicenseDeviceList.title: QuerySpeechLicenseDeviceList
QuerySpeechLicenseDeviceList.summary: Queries the information about devices that are bound to Speech Sending Service licenses.

QuerySubscribeRelation.title: QuerySubscribeRelation
QuerySubscribeRelation.summary: Queries a Message Service (MNS) or AMQP server-side subscription.

QuerySuperDeviceGroup.title: QuerySuperDeviceGroup
QuerySuperDeviceGroup.summary: Queries the information of a parent group by subgroup ID.

QueryThingModel.title: QueryThingModel
QueryThingModel.summary: Queries the TSL features of a specified product.

QueryThingModelExtendConfig.title: QueryThingModelExtendConfig
QueryThingModelExtendConfig.summary: Queries the extended Thing Specification Language (TSL) information of a specified product.

QueryThingModelExtendConfigPublished.title: QueryThingModelExtendConfigPublished
QueryThingModelExtendConfigPublished.summary: Queries the extended parameters of a published Thing Specification Language (TSL) model.

QueryThingModelPublished.title: QueryThingModelPublished
QueryThingModelPublished.summary: Queries the published TSL model of a specified product.

QueryTopicReverseRouteTable.title: QueryTopicReverseRouteTable
QueryTopicReverseRouteTable.summary: Queries the source topics that are subscribed to by a specified custom topic.

QueryTopicRouteTable.title: QueryTopicRouteTable
QueryTopicRouteTable.summary: Queries the destination topics that subscribe to a specified source topic.

QueryVehicleDevice.title: QueryVehicleDevice
QueryVehicleDevice.summary: Queries the information about a device of a JT/T 808 gateway product.

RRpc.title: RRpc
RRpc.summary: Sends a request to a specified device and synchronously receives a response from the device.

ReBindLicenseDevice.title: ReBindLicenseDevice
ReBindLicenseDevice.summary: Rebinds a license to multiple devices of a specific product.

RegisterDevice.title: RegisterDevice
RegisterDevice.summary: Registers a device under a product.

RemoveThingTopo.title: RemoveThingTopo
RemoveThingTopo.summary: Deletes the topological relationships between a gateway and all attached sub-devices, or the topological relationship between a sub-device and the gateway to which the sub-device is attached.

ResetConsumerGroupPosition.title: ResetConsumerGroupPosition
ResetConsumerGroupPosition.summary: Clears the accumulated messages of a consumer group when you use an AMQP server-side subscription.

ResetThing.title: ResetThing
ResetThing.summary: Resets the unique-certificate-per-product registration status of a device that is directly connected to IoT Platform, or deletes the current topology of the device.

ReupgradeOTATask.title: ReupgradeOTATask
ReupgradeOTATask.summary: Reruns one or more failed or canceled device update tasks in a specified update batch.

SaveDeviceProp.title: SaveDeviceProp
SaveDeviceProp.summary: Specifies a tag for a device.

SetDeviceDesiredProperty.title: SetDeviceDesiredProperty
SetDeviceDesiredProperty.summary: Specifies desired values for multiple device properties at a time.

SetDeviceGroupTags.title: SetDeviceGroupTags
SetDeviceGroupTags.summary: Adds, updates, or deletes group tags.

SetDeviceProperty.title: SetDeviceProperty
SetDeviceProperty.summary: Specifies values for the properties of a device.

SetDevicesProperty.title: SetDevicesProperty
SetDevicesProperty.summary: Specifies values for multiple device properties at a time.

SetProductCertInfo.title: SetProductCertInfo
SetProductCertInfo.summary: Specifies X.509 certificate information for a product.

ShareSpeechByCombination.title: ShareSpeechByCombination
ShareSpeechByCombination.summary: Shares and combines audio files for broadcasting on a device.

SubscribeTopic.title: SubscribeTopic
SubscribeTopic.summary: Subscribes to one or more topics for a device.

TransformClientId.title: TransformClientId
TransformClientId.summary: Specifies a valid ClientID for a device to prevent illegal logons if the device contains multiple ClientIDs. This API operation applies to preregistration-free unique-certificate-per-product authentication.

UnbindDriverFromEdgeInstance.title: UnbindDriverFromEdgeInstance
UnbindDriverFromEdgeInstance.summary: Unbinds a driver from an edge instance.

UnbindLicenseProduct.title: UnbindLicenseProduct
UnbindLicenseProduct.summary: Unbinds a license from a specific product.

UpdateConsumerGroup.title: UpdateConsumerGroup
UpdateConsumerGroup.summary: Modifies a consumer group when you configure an AMQP server-side subscription.

UpdateDeviceGroup.title: UpdateDeviceGroup
UpdateDeviceGroup.summary: Modifies the information of a group.

UpdateOTAModule.title: UpdateOTAModule
UpdateOTAModule.summary: Modifies the alias and description of an OTA module.

UpdateParserDataSource.title: UpdateParserDataSource
UpdateParserDataSource.summary: Updates a data source for a parser.

UpdateProduct.title: UpdateProduct
UpdateProduct.summary: Modifies the information about a product.

UpdateProductFilterConfig.title: UpdateProductFilterConfig
UpdateProductFilterConfig.summary: Updates the deduplication rules for property messages that are submitted by the devices of a product. If the call succeeds, the new rules are applied to all the devices of the product.

UpdateSubscribeRelation.title: UpdateSubscribeRelation
UpdateSubscribeRelation.summary: Modifies a Message Service (MNS) or AMQP server-side subscription.

UpdateThingModel.title: UpdateThingModel
UpdateThingModel.summary: Updates a Thing Specification Language (TSL) feature of a specified product. You can also updates the extended information about the feature.

UpdateThingScript.title: UpdateThingScript
UpdateThingScript.summary: Modifies a data parsing script for a specified product.

UpdateTopicConfig.title: UpdateTopicConfig
UpdateTopicConfig.summary: Enables or disables the retained message broadcasting feature for a custom topic.
